Package controllers

Class SeeAllCardsController

java.lang.Object
controllers.SeeAllCardsController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.util.EventListener
public class SeeAllCardsController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener
Class providing the controller for the processes related to displaying all the cards of all the players: salary and career cards at the start of the game

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    SeeAllCardsController​(SeeAllCards displayScr, MainScreen mainScr, GameMaster game)
    Creates a controller object with the graphical user interface related to displaying all the cards of the players and the game master as parameters

  • Constructor Details

    • SeeAllCardsController

      public SeeAllCardsController​(SeeAllCards displayScr, MainScreen mainScr, GameMaster game)
      Creates a controller object with the graphical user interface related to displaying all the cards of the players and the game master as parameters
      Parameters:
      displayScr - Graphical user interface related to displaying all the cards of the players
      mainScr - Graphical user interface related to the actual screen of the game proper
      game - game master (providing access to all the methods necessary to play the game)
